sqls.sql: SELECT T2.APPLICATION_NO, T2.APP_TYPE, T2.STATUS, T2.SERVICE_ID, T1.SUBMIT_DT, T3.HCI_NAME, T3.HCI_CODE FROM APPLICATION_GROUP AS T1 JOIN APPLICATION T2 ON T2.APP_GRP_ID = T1.ID JOIN APP_GRP_PREMISES T3 ON T3.APP_GRP_ID = T1.ID WHERE 1=1 AND T2.APP_TYPE IN ('APTY001', 'APTY002', 'APTY003')
